article_heading: $1 Million for Retirement — Or a Longer Life?

article_heading: The new interior design status symbols
description: The image depicts a simple, yet elegant interior setting. The wall behind the shelf is painted a vibrant pink, which adds a pop of color to the scene. On the shelf, there are three distinct items:  1. A **black vase** with a textured surface, which is positioned on the left side of the shelf. It appears to be empty and is slightly taller than the other items on the shelf.  2. A **black and white photograph** in the center of the shelf. The photograph features a person, but the details of the image are not clear from this description.  3. A **black and white illustration** on the right side of the shelf. The illustration depicts a face with a distinctive hairstyle and is framed in a simple, black border.  The shelf itself is white and provides a clean, minimalist backdrop for the items on it. The overall style of the image suggests a modern, possibly bohemian, aesthetic.
